document_title: Amoebic dysentery: Symptoms, causes, diagnosis, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Antibiotics are used to treat amoebic dysentery, and there are also medications to treat gastrointestinal symptoms. Patients need to see a doctor for appropriate treatment to avoid dangerous complications.
Medication is the initial treatment solution for amoebiasis
